caption.p: Effects of MLVA on growth rate of rats treated with nitrobenzene.

Data are given as mean Â± SD of rats per group. n = 6. MLVA: methanolic leaf extract of Vernonia amygdalina. Group A (control), group B (nitrobenzene[NB] only); group C (NB + 200 MLVA), group D (NB + 400 MLVA); group E (NB + 400 MLVA).
